name: The Game of Klyxx
description:
The Game of Life, remixed as a game for our company, Klyxx. Get a career, interns, and salary as you make your way through the twists and turns of life, hopefully avoiding the potholes on the way.


We've made this game with instructions and fully playable, so you can play with your remote or in-person teams.


A remixed version of "Game of Strife 2020" on community.
